parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the action assigned to a control of the currently active user dialog. Can be used for buttons and active texts. Read [[Arma: GUI Configuration]] for more information about user dialogs and controls.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''buttonAction''' idc
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]. index of button
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> '''buttonAction''' control

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[buttonSetAction]] [100, {[[player]] [[exec]] "reply.sqs"}]
_action = buttonAction 100</code>

returns {[[player]] [[exec]] "reply.sqs"}

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[buttonSetAction]], [[ctrlActivate]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|BUTTONACTION]]
